text: María Duval (born María Mogilesky; 17 May 1926 - 10 May 2022) was an Argentine actress. She was popular during the 1940s. She made 21 movies from 1940 until her retirement in 1948. She was born in Bahía Blanca, Argentina. Her best known roles were in La senda oscura (1947), Story of a Bad Woman (1947), La serpiente de cascabel (1948), Cita en las estrellas (1949) and El extraño caso de la mujer asesinada (1949). Duval died on 10 May 2022 at her home in Buenos Aires, Argentine one week before her 96th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:People from Bahía Blanca
title: María Duval (Argentine actress)
